RandomXCache
Encapsulation for managing RandomX cache.

Encapsulation for managing RandomX datasets with multi-threaded initialization.

Enum representing the RandomX flags.

JNA interface to map the RandomX native library functions.

Singleton to load the RandomX native library using JNA.

Template class for RandomX operations, providing a common workflow.
